meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to three feet.
meanings.sent1: He measured the room using leeps to determine its size.
meanings.sent2: The sign indicated that the next exit was two leeps away.
meanings.sent3: The leeps on the map helped us estimate how far we had traveled.
meanings.sent4: The leeps between the trees marked the path through the forest.
meanings.sent5: She paced out the leeps to measure the length of the hallway.

meanings.definition: To jump or spring a long distance.
meanings.sent1: The athlete leeps over the hurdle effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit leeps across the field to escape the fox.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo leeps joyfully in the open field.
meanings.sent4: The dancer leeps gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: He leeps over the puddle to avoid getting his shoes wet.

meanings.sent3: The cat leeps lazily in the sunbeam, enjoying a catnap.
